Module vpm.gui_prototype
Package vpm.gui_prototype.controllers

Class EditPetFieldController

java.lang.Object
vpm.gui_prototype.controllers.EditPetFieldController
public class EditPetFieldController extends Object
Controller class to handle the EditPetFieldView. Manages the editing of pet attributes such as name, age, colour, and personality.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up the pet manager and initializes the color and personality ComboBoxes.

    • evaluatePetName

      public String evaluatePetName(String petName)
      Evaluates if the pet's name meets the specified conditions: - Length of 2 to 12 characters - No special characters
      Parameters:
      petName - the user's input string for the pet's name
      Returns:
      a message indicating the validation result

    • setPetAndField

      public void setPetAndField(Pet pet, String field)
      Sets the pet and the specific field to be edited.
      Parameters:
      pet - the pet object to be edited
      field - the field of the pet's detail to be edited

    • setOnSaveCallback

      public void setOnSaveCallback(Runnable onSaveCallback)
      Sets the callback function to be executed upon saving.
      Parameters:
      onSaveCallback - the callback function to execute
